Creole Wiki notation¶

Author:

Kompira development team

Introduction¶

You can use Creole in the wiki page that can be created as a Kompira object.

In this material the grammar of Creole will be explained.

Notation¶

Italic¶

//italics//

italics

Bold¶

**bold**

bold

List¶

* Bullet list
* Second item
** Sub item

  • Bullet list

  • Second item

    • Sub item

Numbered list¶

# Numbered list
# Second item
## Sub item

  1. Numbered list

  2. Second item

  1. Sub item

Link¶

Link to [[/home]]
[[http://www.wikicreole.org|wikicreole]]

Link to /home

WikiCreole

Heading¶

== Large heading
=== Medium heading
==== Small heading

Large heading¶

Medium heading¶

Small heading¶

New line¶

Force\\linebreak

Force

linebreak

Horizontal line¶

Horizontal line:
----

Horizontal line:

Table¶

|=|=table|=header|
|a|table|row|
|b|table|row|

table

header

a

table

row

b

table

row

Reference¶

{{{
  == [[Nowiki]]:
  //**don't format//
}}}

== [[Nowiki]]:
//**don't format//

Others¶

WikiCreole(External site)
